html:
Throwing rocks at stones
Walking naked on grass
Drinking water during storms
Ordering pizza at a wedding
Loud mumbling to people
Pointless yelling in toilets
With no sense at all
Leaving a lot of questions
Continuous laughter
Shared among of people
Being separated by space
And multiple walls
Map leading to nowhere
Is all I got left
I can only wish
It will be a nice place
title: Map
